news_header: Company to publish interim report; typically a loss in Q4.
news_original_title: Sanoman katsauksessa huomio kiinnittyy ohjeistukseen, jossa piilee analyysitalon mukaan riski
news_text: The company providing media and learning services will publish its interim report for October-December tomorrow. In this quarter, the result of Message is typically loss-making due to the seasonal nature of learning services.
